about.text: Hi, I'm Felipe Destro, a Brazilian software engineer currently in the sixth semester of a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. My journey in programming began in 2020, when, while developing my first final project using JavaScript, I realized the transformative power of technology. At the time, I was also a programmer on the FRC (First Robotics Competition) robotics team, which further strengthened my passion for the field. Over time, I specialized in front-end development, where I find satisfaction in creating interactive and intuitive experiences.

hero.text: I'm a programming enthusiast, learning to build robust and responsive web applications. Developing since 2020, I've been refining my skills in front-end and its technologies such as React, Next.js, and TypeScript, as well as back-end and database technologies like Node.js and MySQL. My goal is to leverage my experience to create innovative solutions that drive business growth and deliver exceptional user experiences.

projects.title: Projects
projects.descIgnite: Interactive social media feed simulator that allows users to comment, like, and remove comments, offering a seamless and delightful user journey.
projects.descPortfolio: A personal portfolio website that showcases projects, skills, and contact information, ideal for highlighting competencies and facilitating professional connections.
projects.descWf: A web application hosting mini-games such as chess, puzzles, tic-tac-toe, and a whiteboard, providing an interactive digital platform for users to enjoy.
